name: Fancy News
author: radykal

sections.description:
With this wordpresss plugin you can create a news slider easily and you can add any type of post to it (except pages). You can also select post by taxonomies and terms. If you would like to load the content of a RSS feed, thats also possible.

Demo

Setup

To add Fancy News to a page, you have to add the shortcode for it. The plugin comes with a helpful Shortcode Builder, that can be found under Tools > Fancy News. Here you set the content for a News slider and set some other options.

More awesome plugins by the author
sections.installation: Simply drop the fancy-news folder into your wp-content/plugins folder.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

Simply drop the fancy-news folder into your wp-content/plugins folder.
